critical_discoveries.title: Comprehensive Resource Audit Reveals Platform Scope
critical_discoveries.description: Full audit identified 67 orphaned resources including complete interactive platforms, revealing Te Kete Ako is far larger than initially understood
key_findings: 21 Y8 Systems resources completely orphaned from navigation
4 revolutionary platforms (Digital Pūrākau, Living Whakapapa, Virtual Marae, Society Design) buried
Interactive literacy workbook in old-lessons/ folder not accessible
12+ professional pages missing (About, Contact, Terms, etc.)
critical_discoveries.impact: Platform scope is 10x larger than initially apparent - we're just getting started

critical_discoveries.title: Platform Professional Credibility Established
critical_discoveries.description: Created essential professional pages and navigation infrastructure for educational adoption
implementation: About page with mission/vision/values and cultural authenticity
Contact page with multiple support channels and FAQ
Activities added to main navigation (was completely orphaned)
critical_discoveries.next_steps: Add Terms of Service, complete navigation standardization across 46+ remaining pages

critical_discoveries.title: Y8 Systems Gold Standard Integration Model
critical_discoveries.description: Successfully integrated 21 orphaned Y8 Systems resources into handouts.html with thematic categorization

pattern_established.organization: Grouped by pedagogical function (core systems, indigenous governance, treaty/decolonization, activism)
pattern_established.navigation: Section headers with proper visual hierarchy

critical_discoveries.replication_potential: This pattern can be applied to integrate remaining orphaned resources

critical_discoveries.title: TE-KETE-AKO Folder Contains Excessive Files
critical_discoveries.description: User observation that TE-KETE-AKO folder contains 'WAAAY more than we need' suggests significant cleanup required
implications: Development files mixed with production content
File structure not optimized for teaching workflow
Potential performance impacts from unused assets
critical_discoveries.recommended_action: Use specialized AI Agent Team to audit and clean folder structure

critical_discoveries.title: Specialized AI Agent Team Architecture Should Be Utilized
critical_discoveries.description: Current single-agent approach is inefficient for complex platform with 600+ resources and multiple specialized domains
agent_specializations_needed: Resource Integration Specialist - for connecting orphaned content
Navigation Architecture Specialist - for site structure optimization
Cultural Content Specialist - for Te Ao Māori authenticity
Technical Cleanup Specialist - for folder structure and performance
Curriculum Alignment Specialist - for NZ Curriculum connections
Assessment Framework Specialist - for rubrics and evaluation tools
critical_discoveries.efficiency_gains: Specialized agents can work in parallel on their domains rather than single agent doing everything

critical_discoveries.title: GraphRAG Updates Critical for Session Continuity
critical_discoveries.description: User emphasized importance of GraphRAG updates so 'we can just pick up and get going faster going forward'
critical_discoveries.current_implementation: Manual updates via neo4j_loader_official.py and development_knowledge_updates.json

session_achievements: 21 Y8 Systems resources integrated into navigation
Activities page added to main navigation
Navigation header styling improved across mobile/desktop
Platform scope fully mapped and documented
next_session_priorities: Deploy specialized AI Agent Team Architecture
Complete navigation standardization across remaining 46+ pages
Integrate interactive literacy workbook from old-lessons/
Create Terms of Service for legal compliance

integration_patterns_discovered.orphaned_resource_integration: Section headers + color coding + curriculum tags + thematic grouping
integration_patterns_discovered.professional_page_structure: Hero section + grid layout + CTA + footer standardization
integration_patterns_discovered.navigation_standardization: 8-link structure with Activities added as universal pattern
